ability.ability_aerial_dodge.desc: In the air you can press jump again to double jump.
ability.ability_aerial_dodge_1.name: Aerial Dodge LV.1
ability.ability_aerial_dodge_2.name: Aerial Dodge LV.2
ability.ability_aerial_dodge_3.name: Aerial Dodge LV.3
ability.ability_aerial_dodge_4.name: Aerial Dodge MAX
ability.ability_auto_final.desc: Automatically sets the Reaction Command to Final in a pinch, if Final Form is usable.
ability.ability_auto_final.name: Auto Final
ability.ability_auto_limit.desc: Automatically sets the Reaction Command to Limit in a pinch, if Limit Form is usable.
ability.ability_auto_limit.name: Auto Limit
ability.ability_auto_master.desc: Automatically sets the Reaction Command to Master in a pinch, if Master Form is usable.
ability.ability_auto_master.name: Auto Master
ability.ability_auto_valor.desc: Automatically sets the Reaction Command to Valor in a pinch, if Valor Form is usable.
ability.ability_auto_valor.name: Auto Valor
ability.ability_auto_wisdom.desc: Automatically sets the Reaction Command to Wisdom in a pinch, if Wisdom Form is usable.
ability.ability_auto_wisdom.name: Auto Wisdom
ability.ability_berserk_charge.desc: Gives the user +2 Strength when in MP recharge. Stack the ability to increase the effect.
ability.ability_berserk_charge.name: Berserk Charge
ability.ability_blizzard_boost.desc: Increases damage done with blizzard-based attacks.
ability.ability_blizzard_boost.name: Blizzard Boost
ability.ability_blizzaza.desc: Allows the user to get the Blizzaza reaction command.
ability.ability_blizzaza.name: Blizzaza
ability.ability_combo_plus.desc: Increases maximum combo by 1 when on the ground. Equip more to enable more combos
ability.ability_combo_plus.name: Combo Plus
ability.ability_critical_boost.desc: Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 10%. Stack the ability to increase the effect.
ability.ability_critical_boost.name: Critical Boost
ability.ability_curaza.desc: Allows the user to get the Curaza reaction command.
ability.ability_curaza.name: Curaza
ability.ability_damage_control.desc: Halve the damage you take when your HP is at 25% or below. Stack the ability to increase the effect.
ability.ability_damage_control.name: Damage Control
ability.ability_damage_drive.desc: Restores the Drive Gauge every time damage is taken. The amount restored to the Drive Gauge is relative to the damage received.
ability.ability_damage_drive.name: Damage Drive
ability.ability_dark_domination.desc: Allows the user to control Antiform at will.
ability.ability_dark_domination.name: Dark Domination
ability.ability_dodge_roll.desc: If you press the action button while walking you will dodge roll.
ability.ability_dodge_roll_1.name: Dodge Roll LV.1
ability.ability_dodge_roll_2.name: Dodge Roll LV.2
ability.ability_dodge_roll_3.name: Dodge Roll LV.3
ability.ability_dodge_roll_4.name: Dodge Roll MAX
ability.ability_drive_boost.desc: Allows greater restoration of the Drive Gauge during MP Charge.
ability.ability_drive_boost.name: Drive Boost
ability.ability_drive_converter.desc: Increment all Drive Point prizes value
ability.ability_drive_converter.name: Drive Converter
ability.ability_endless_magic.desc: Allows the user to reduce the cooldown between magic casts. Stack the ability to increase the effect.
ability.ability_endless_magic.name: Endless Magic
ability.ability_experience_boost.desc: Increases experience gained by 100% when you are at half health or less.
ability.ability_experience_boost.name: Experience Boost
ability.ability_extra_cast.desc: Allows the use of one last spell before running out of MP.
ability.ability_extra_cast.name: Extra Cast
ability.ability_finishing_plus.desc: Unleash successive finishing moves after combos.
ability.ability_finishing_plus.name: Finishing Plus
ability.ability_firaza.desc: Allows the user to get the Firaza reaction command.
ability.ability_firaza.name: Firaza
ability.ability_fire_boost.desc: Increases damage done with fire-based attacks.
ability.ability_fire_boost.name: Fire Boost
ability.ability_focus_converter.name: Focus Converter
ability.ability_form_boost.desc: Increases the duration of each Drive Form.
ability.ability_form_boost.name: Form Boost
ability.ability_full_mp_blast.desc: When your MP is full, increase the power of your first magical ability by 50%. Stack the ability to increase the effect.
ability.ability_full_mp_blast.name: Full MP Blast
ability.ability_glide.desc: In the air, hold the jump key to glide.
ability.ability_glide_1.name: Glide LV.1
ability.ability_glide_2.name: Glide LV.2
ability.ability_glide_3.name: Glide LV.3
ability.ability_glide_4.name: Glide MAX
ability.ability_grand_magic_haste.desc: Gives the user a higher chance to cast an upgraded magic. Stack the ability to increase the chance.
ability.ability_grand_magic_haste.name: Grand Magic Haste
ability.ability_high_jump.desc: Now you can jump really high!
ability.ability_high_jump_1.name: High Jump LV.1
ability.ability_high_jump_2.name: High Jump LV.2
ability.ability_high_jump_3.name: High Jump LV.3
ability.ability_high_jump_4.name: High Jump MAX
ability.ability_hp_gain.desc: Restores a bit of HP when a shotlock impacts. Stack the ability to increase the effect.
ability.ability_hp_gain.name: HP Gain
ability.ability_item_boost.desc: Increases effect done with healing items on the field by 50%. Equip more to increase the effect.
ability.ability_item_boost.name: Item Boost
ability.ability_jackpot.desc: Increment the values for HP, MP and Munny prizes. Stack the ability to increase the effect.
ability.ability_jackpot.name: Jackpot
ability.ability_leaf_bracer.desc: Casting Cure on yourself will continue even when attacked.
ability.ability_leaf_bracer.name: Leaf Bracer
ability.ability_light_and_darkness.name: Light & Darkness
ability.ability_lucky_lucky.desc: Brings luck, fortune and looting to the wearer, increasing the drop rate of items. Stack the ability to increase the effect.
ability.ability_lucky_lucky.name: Lucky Strike
ability.ability_magic_lock_on.desc: Allows the user to use some magics at the locked entity's position.
ability.ability_magic_lock_on.name: Magic Lock-On
ability.ability_mp_haste.desc: Increases MP restoration speed after MP is fully consumed.
ability.ability_mp_haste.name: MP Haste
ability.ability_mp_hastega.desc: Highly Increases MP restoration speed after MP is fully consumed.
ability.ability_mp_hastega.name: MP Hastega
ability.ability_mp_hastera.desc: Increases MP restoration speed even more after MP is fully consumed.
ability.ability_mp_hastera.name: MP Hastera
ability.ability_mp_rage.desc: Restores MP relative to the amount of damage taken.
ability.ability_mp_rage.name: MP Rage
ability.ability_mp_safety.desc: Disable recharging when MP runs out using shortcuts. Except if it's Cure
ability.ability_mp_safety.name: MP Safety
ability.ability_mp_thrift.desc: Decrease MP cost by 20%. Stack the ability to increaase the effect.
ability.ability_mp_thrift.name: MP Thrift
ability.ability_negative_combo.desc: Decreases maximum combo on the ground and in midair by 1. Equip more to increase the effect.
ability.ability_negative_combo.name: Negative Combo
ability.ability_quick_run.desc: If you press the action button while running you will sprint.
ability.ability_quick_run_1.name: Quick Run LV.1
ability.ability_quick_run_2.name: Quick Run LV.2
ability.ability_quick_run_3.name: Quick Run LV.3
ability.ability_quick_run_4.name: Quick Run MAX
ability.ability_scan.name: Scan
ability.ability_second_chance.desc: Ensures 1 HP remains after taking massive damage.
ability.ability_second_chance.name: Second Chance
ability.ability_strike_raid.desc: Right click while crouching to throw your keyblade, uses 10MP.
ability.ability_strike_raid.name: Strike Raid
ability.ability_synch_blade.desc: Equips a weapon in each hand. The ability of the left hand weapon becomes available as well.
ability.ability_synch_blade.name: Synch Blade
ability.ability_thundaza.desc: Allows the user to get the Thundaza reaction command.
ability.ability_thundaza.name: Thundaza
ability.ability_thunder_boost.desc: Increases damage done with thunder-based attacks.
ability.ability_thunder_boost.name: Thunder Boost
ability.ability_treasure_magnet.desc: Automatically draw in and collect nearby prizes. Stack the ability to increase the effect.
ability.ability_treasure_magnet.name: Treasure Magnet
ability.ability_water_boost.desc: Increases damage done with water-based attacks.
ability.ability_water_boost.name: Water Boost
ability.ability_waterza.desc: Allows the user to get the Waterza reaction command.
ability.ability_waterza.name: Waterza
ability.ability_wizards_ruse.desc: Potentially recover HP proportionate to the MP you should expend. Stack the ability to increase the odds.
ability.ability_wizards_ruse.name: Wizard's Ruse
ability.ability_zero_exp.name: Zero EXP

gui.org.line1: By donning the Dark Robe you are now a member of Organization XIII.
gui.org.line2: Choose a member of Organization XIII you align with.
gui.org.line3: Your choice will determine the weapon you start with.
gui.org.line5: It will cost to change this after you have made your choice.
gui.proofofheart.desc: Use this to leave Organization XIII
gui.proofofheart.desc2: You won't be able to use it if you're wearing the Organization XIII robes
gui.proofofheart.notinorg: You are not in Organization XIII
gui.proofofheart.unequip: First unequip your Organization XIII armor
gui.summonarmor.notenoughspace: You don't have enough room in your inventory
item.kingdomkeys.disc_0.desc: Yoko Shimomura & Kaoru Wada - Birth by Sleep -A Link to the Future-
item.kingdomkeys.disc_1.desc: Yoko Shimomura - Dearly Beloved -Union χ Credits Version-
item.kingdomkeys.disc_15.desc: Yoko Shimomura - Cavern of Remembrance -Days Version-
item.kingdomkeys.disc_18.desc: Yoko Shimomura - Hunter of the Dark
item.kingdomkeys.disc_2.desc: Yoko Shimomura - Passion -Kingdom Orchestra Instrumental Version-
item.kingdomkeys.disc_3.desc: Yoko Shimomura & Kaoru Wada - Dream Drop Distance -The Next Awakening-
item.kingdomkeys.disc_4.desc: Yoko Shimomura & Kaoru Wada - Hikari -KINGDOM Instrumental Version-
item.kingdomkeys.disc_6.desc: Yoko Shimomura - Musique pour la tristesse de Xion
item.kingdomkeys.disc_7.desc: Yoko Shimomura & Hirosato Noda - No More Bugs!! -Bug Version-
jei.info.kingdomkeys.blast_blox: TNT-like with more destructive power, triggers on contact with anything but a feather in your hand.
jei.info.kingdomkeys.bounce_blox: Entities that step on this block will bounce, sneak to land on the block without bouncing.
jei.info.kingdomkeys.danger_blox: Similar to a Cactus but deals more damage, causes damage on contact and also when hit. Unlike a Cactus it has no placement limits or growth. Wear boots to avoid damage while walking on them.
jei.info.kingdomkeys.final_orb: Use to unlock Final Form. Final has a 2nd Keyblade slot. Activation requires 5 bars of the Drive Gauge. Dropped from breaking Rare Prize Blox.
jei.info.kingdomkeys.ghost_blox: Apply a redstone signal to toggle the visibility of the Ghost Blox and all adjacent Ghost Blox, while in the invisible state they have no collision.
jei.info.kingdomkeys.keychains: Keychains can be used to summon the associated Keyblade by equipping the keychain through the Kingdom Keys menu, use the summon key to summon the Keyblade.
jei.info.kingdomkeys.limit_orb: Use to unlock Limit Form. Activation requires 4 bars of the Drive Gauge. Dropped from breaking Rare Prize Blox.
jei.info.kingdomkeys.magnet_blox: Pulls or pushes entities in the direction its facing. Apply a redstone signal to activate, right click to change the range and sneak-right click with your fist to toggle attract and repel mode.
jei.info.kingdomkeys.master_orb: Use to unlock Master Form. Master has a 2nd Keyblade slot. Activation requires 4 bars of the Drive Gauge. Dropped from breaking Rare Prize Blox.
jei.info.kingdomkeys.moogle_projector: Obtained from Moogles when killed by an Anvil. Used for Item Synthesis and upgrading Keyblades via the Keyblade Forge and depositing materials used for Synthesis. Moogles also serve the same purpose as this.
jei.info.kingdomkeys.organization_robes: Wear the full Organization set to join and select a member to start with, no matter who you choose you can unlock every member's weapons however it requires unlocking the adjacent member's weapon first.
jei.info.kingdomkeys.organization_weapon: As an Organization member you can unlock weapons within the equipment menu by spending hearts gained from kills, you will earn 2x hearts from using a weapon from your chosen member. Summon the weapons using the summon key.
jei.info.kingdomkeys.proof_of_heart: Obtained from defeating the Ender Dragon, use this to leave the Organization.
jei.info.kingdomkeys.recipes: Dropped from mobs and found in Moogle house chests in villages. Use these to unlock recipes for Item Synthesis.
jei.info.kingdomkeys.spell_orb: Use to unlock the specified spell. Once unlocked magic can be used with the Command Menu as long as you have enough MP, until level 5 you will have 0 MP. Dropped from breaking Prize Blox.
jei.info.kingdomkeys.valor_orb: Use to unlock Valor Form. Valor has a 2nd Keyblade slot. Activation requires 3 bars of the Drive Gauge. Dropped from breaking Rare Prize Blox.
jei.info.kingdomkeys.wisdom_orb: Use to unlock Wisdom Form. Activation requires 3 bars of the Drive Gauge. Dropped from breaking Rare Prize Blox.
